bio: A man who wears sunglasses quite a lot of the time but also does quite a lot in consumer tech Low Carbon Jargon Chief Talker Samsung Telecommunications Senior Manager, Market Intelligence Bobble Hat Strategy and Media Gun for hire Beanstalk Charity Reader Helper TalkTalk Market Intelligence Lead Senior Market Mobile Conference Social Media Manager Phones 4u Online Content Writer, Dialaphone EE Head of Consumer Market Intelligence Motorola Senior Strategy Manager, Multimedia Motorola Head of Competitor Intelligence and Market Forecasting What Mobile Editor-in-Chief Mobile Choice Features Editor Informa Assistant Editor
